channel.title: New Graphics ratings?
channel.description:
Mr.Chris, please don't lock this. Let people post there opinion.
My proposal is, get rid of the old /10 ratings and bring in new more sexy ratings from F upto A+ I'm thinking you can put your opinion across alot stronger with this. And if it gets enforced by you Chris, it will start off. Heres what i think
F - Not good needs improvements. E - Very average, work harder. D - Ok, add more detail and take more time on it. C - Pretty good, still improvements can be made. B - I like this alot, well done, Keep the good work up. A - Brilliant, i like this alot, very good. A+ - This is the best piece of work i have seen ever. Congratulations.
I like this, and i hope other people will. As i said Chris, please let people get there opinions across.
So.. People of the graphics community :) * Sounds posh * Please post what you think. And if many people like it? and it gets enforced, Worthy of sticky? :|

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I’m going to use 1 to 8069953

Read full topic

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

I honestly couldn’t care less. Use whatever the hell you want. The only difference is a-f is only 6, where as 1-10 is obviously 10, so 1-10 is more accurate.

I’m going to use A-Z from now on.

Read full topic

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @flamed_fury1 flamed fury1
item.description:
@flamed_fury1 wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I think, if you want people to rate you out of 10 or F - A+, all you have to do is say on your post.

Just do that it’s easiest.

Read full topic

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

OO, so if people like, it has a chance?

Read full topic

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

TBH, either one works.

Aslong as people tell you how to make it better, it shouldn’t matter.

The thing is with this, is that if this is how the majority of people wanted it, it would be a tough thing to enforce. Not everyone would rate like that.

I think, if you want people to rate you out of 10 or F - A+, all you have to do is say on your post.

I’m also trying to keep stickies down to a minimum. IMO, they just look “eurgh”. I’m going to leave Stars one up 'til the end of SOTW and I’m thinking about taking down the FAQ: Graphics one.

Read full topic

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Why does it matter? /10’s easier in my opinion and requires less thought

Read full topic

0/10 or a letter system generally mean the same thing what difference does it make :), dosnt really matter how you grade someone elses work in my opinion

item.title: New Graphics ratings?
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

Mr.Chris, please don’t lock this.
Let people post there opinion.

My proposal is, get rid of the old /10 ratings and bring in new more sexy ratings from
F upto A+
I’m thinking you can put your opinion across alot stronger with this. And if it gets enforced by you Chris, it will start off.
Heres what i think

F - Not good needs improvements.
E - Very average, work harder.
D - Ok, add more detail and take more time on it.
C - Pretty good, still improvements can be made.
B - I like this alot, well done, Keep the good work up.
A - Brilliant, i like this alot, very good.
A+ - This is the best piece of work i have seen ever. Congratulations.

I like this, and i hope other people will.
As i said Chris, please let people get there opinions across.

So… People of the graphics community * Sounds posh *
Please post what you think.
And if many people like it? and it gets enforced, Worthy of sticky?
